full_text: Alisher Usmanov is one of Russia’s wealthiest oligarchs and has been sanctioned by the U.S. So why did a shipment of pig iron from one of his companies steam into Alabama early this month? https://t.co/RmzBpAZBwK

localize.full_text: Alisher Usmanovはロシアで最も裕福なオリガルヒの一人で、米国から制裁を受けている。ではなぜ、彼の会社の一つからの銑鉄の出荷が今月初めにアラバマ州で蒸発したのか？https://t.co/RmzBpAZBwK。
